title: Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Multicultural Leadership Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customized learning experiences for team leaders in BYOD environments, incorporating real-time feedback

learning_goals: Three or more context-appropriate communication strategies can be developed by analyzing cultural differences among multicultural team members
Personal cultural biases can be recognized, and action plans to overcome them can be established and explained to peers
Reflective journals based on real-world work cases can be created using mobile learning modules to achieve over 80% learning effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
